code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./css/advicePage.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AdvicePosts(){const[posts,setPosts]=useState([]);const getposts=()=>{axios.get('/api/advice').then(response=>setPosts(response.data)).catch(error=>console.error('There was an error fetching the advice posts:',error));};useEffect(()=>{getposts();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{classname:"advice-posts",children:posts.map(post=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:()=>{/* navigate to post detail */},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:post.question})},post.id))});}export default AdvicePosts;
